SVGAnimatedRectAnimVal.summary: The animVal read-only property of the interface represents the current animated value of the viewBox attribute of an SVG element as a read-only object. It provides access to the rectangle's dynamic state, including the x, y, width, and height values during the animation.

remarks.para: If no animation is applied, the animVal property reflects the SVG element's {{SVGAttr("viewBox")}} attribute value and will be identical to .

SVGAnimatedRectAnimVal.value: A object representing the animated value of the viewBox attribute.
